item.title: Heather add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Heather add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Heather add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Heather add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Never is an awfully long time." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Heather add a quote by James M. Barrie
item.description: "Oh, the cleverness of me!" -- James M. Barrie

item.title: Heather add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Stars are beautiful, but they may not take part in anything, they must just look on forever." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Heather add a quote by Elizabeth Kostova
item.description: "The heart does not go backward. Only the mind." -- Elizabeth Kostova

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mary Jean Irion
item.description: "Normal day, let me be aware of the treasure you are. Let me learn from you, love you, bless you before you depart. Let me not pass you by in quest of some rare and perfect tomorrow. Let me hold you while I may, for it may not always be so. One day I shall dig my nails into the earth, or bury my face in the pillow, or stretch myself taut, or raise my hands to the sky and want, more than all the world, your return." -- Mary Jean Irion

item.title: Heather add a quote by Studs Terkel
item.description: "Curiosity never killed this cat’ — that’s what I’d like as my epitaph" -- Studs Terkel

item.title: Heather add a quote by Studs Terkel
item.description: "How come you don't work fourteen hours a day? Your great-great-grandparents did. How come you only work the eight-hour day? Four guys got hanged fighting for the eight-hour day for you." -- Studs Terkel

item.title: Heather add a quote by Studs Terkel
item.description: "Chicago is not the most corrupt of cities. The state of New Jersey has a couple. Need we mention Nevada? Chicago, though, is the Big Daddy. Not more corrupt, just more theatrical, more colorful in its shadiness." -- Studs Terkel

item.title: Heather add a quote by Studs Terkel
item.description: "Most people were raised to think they are not worthy. School is a process of taking beautiful kids who are filled with life and beating them into happy slavery. That's as true of a twenty-five-thousand-dollar-a-year executive as it is for the poorest." Bill Talcott - Organizer" -- Studs Terkel
